title: Rug
description: rug, Chimayo, made up of two strips seamed in the middle; design of horizontal stripes in pink, red, gray, and pale orange. Inner side border of double-edged saw tooth band in orange, outer border of sawtooth zigzag stripes in red and pink; at ends triple border of red, rose, and pink bands; ends lightly fringed
creditline: Gift of Mrs C. C. Bovey
